baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, and buffs with long cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +30%] [ +40%] [ +5% when wand is equipped]
Crit Damage: [ +13%]
Damage: [ up to +40%]
Final Damage: [ +3% for each party member up to +18%] [ up to +10% from debuff] [ +25% from debuff for holy attacks] [ +30%]
Knockback Resistance: [ +40%] [ +60%]
Buff Duration: [ +50%]
Ignore DEF: [ +44% from debuff] [ +20%] [ +20%]
Ignore Elemental Resistance: [ +10%]
Abnormal Status Resistance: [ 40]
EXP Rate (From Monsters): [ +50%] [ +20% for each Bishop up to +60%]

buffInfo.toggles: (Mode Switch)
buffInfo.summons: [ (60s cd)(B) / (30s cd)(V) ] (10s cd)(B) (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (75s cd) (60s cd)(V) (90s cd) (264s - 144s cd)(V) (180s cd) (60s cd) (120s cd) (180 - 60s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (59 - 30s cd) (180s cd) (60s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (60s cd, blocks 1 death - 600s cd) (60s cd)
buffInfo.damageReduce: (-10% | 90s cd) (-MP | 60s cd)

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Magician' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Magician and talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'The 3 Arcane Paths'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Cleric and you will be on the path to a Bishop. Cleric is the 2nd job of Bishop

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Holy Symbol - Item Drop
  • Advanced Blessing - Ferocity and Boss Rush
  • Holy Magic Shell - Persist
  • Holy Magic Shell - Enhance or Holy Symbol - Experience for training

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to bel and the members of the Explorer Mage Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Benevolence and Vengeance
extraContent.content:
At Lv. 140, you unlock the Hyper Skill, Righteously Indignant that allows you to swap between Benevolence skills and Venegeance skills

Benevolence skills provide supportive abilties like party heals and utility while Venegeance skills provide offensive abilities like attacks and self-buffs. Benevolence and Venegeance skills share the same Key Slot and Skill Points (SP)

Below are a list of all Benevolence and Venegeance skills:

  • / Heal & Angelic Wrath (2nd Job)
  • / Holy Fountain & Fountain of Venegeance (3rd Job)
  • / Dispel & Triumph Feather (3rd Job)
  • / Holy Water & Blood of the Divine (4th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'An Arrangement from the Goddess'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 78%, Number of Attacks: 4 Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: Excludes attacks that deal %Max HP damage
Will not work if you have 0 MP

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 190, and up and down with 295
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Mana Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\nHold the Jump key after using to spend 20 MP to descent slowly for up to 5 sec.
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air

After using Mana Wave, holding the Jump Key will allow you to slowly float down
  • You can move while floating

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +90

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Holy Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Fire a blast of holy arrows forward
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.name: Blessed Ensemble
primary.shortDesc: Including yourself, increases final damage by 2% in proportion to the number of nearby party members you have buffed. 20% bonus EXP fo each Cleric in the party.
primary.desc: Increases your %Final Damage for every nearby party member you have buffed
details: Grants increased %EXP from enemies for each Cleric in your party (up to 60%)

primary.name: Heal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Recovery: 300%, Heal's Cooldown per Party Member Healed: -2 sec\nCooldown: 4 sec.
primary.desc: Heals nearby party members
details: Cooldown is reduced based on the number of members in your party
Deals damage to Undead type monsters

primary.name: Angelic Wrath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 5.\nEnemies stuck have their Defense reduced by 44% for 60 sec.\nCooldown: 10 sec.
primary.desc: Calls an angel to strike forward and debuff enemies hit
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %Defense

primary.name: Bless
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Attack Power: +15, Magic ATT: +15, DEF: +300, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Agile Magic
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +20

primary.name: Invincible
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -25%

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed: 5% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Shining Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 254%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 60%, Stun Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: Shines a ray of light that damages nearby enemies and has a chance to stun
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.name: Holy Fountain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, restores 40% HP when used, able to use 20 times total. Duration: 60 sec. Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Creates a fountain which party members can press the Up Arrow Key to restore some %Max HP
details: Has a fixed number of uses before the fountain disappears
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Fountain of Vengeance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 60 sec.\nPeriodically deals 180% damage 5 times to up to 8 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a stationary fountain that periodically damages nearby enemies

primary.name: Divine Protection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, resist critical Abnormal Status once. Cooldown: 75 sec\n[Passive Effect: Increases Abnormal Status and all Elemental Resistance by 40]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Abnormal Status (Debuff)
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Cooldown is reduced for each party member cured by

primary.name: Mystic Door
primary.shortDesc: MP 60, Portal Duration: 200 sec
primary.desc: Creates a portal that leads to the nearest town for your party members
details: To use, press the Up Arrow Key

primary.name: Dispel
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, after nullifying magic and curing Abnormal Status at 100% chance, Dispel's cooldown reduced by 4 sec and Divine Protection's cooldown reduced by 8 sec for each party member cured\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Cures party members of Abnormal Statuses
details: If a party member is cured, the cooldown of Dispel and are reduced
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF skill effect transparency to party members' debuffs

primary.name: Triumph Feather
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Duration: 120 sec. Upon striking an enemy with an attack skill, creates 4 angel feathers every 4 sec that seek enemies and deal 230% damage 4 times.\nAngel Feather Cooldown: 3 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: While active, periodically when damaging enemies with a skill, create feathers that seek out and attack enemies

primary.name: Holy Symbol
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, EXP Bonus: 50%, Duration: 240 sec
primary.desc: Increases the amount of EXP gained from enemies for all party members nearby
details: If party members go too far, the effects of Holy Symbol are reduced

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Additional MP Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Damage: 340%, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: While toggled, using will damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance
Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Teleport Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Distance: Horizontal +65, Vertical +25.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of

primary.name: Holy Magic Shell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, HP Recovered: 50% of max HP, Duration: 15 sec, Max Number of Attacks Blocked: 15, Damage: -10% for attacks that do a certain percentage of your Max HP.\nCannot trigger Holy Magic for 80 sec Cooldown: 90 sec.
primary.desc: Restores 50% of Max HP to nearby party members and grants them a shield
details:
The shield will absorb a set number of attacks before disappearing
  • If the attack was a %Max HP attack, you will take reduced damage instead
After receiving a Holy Magic Shell, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +13%

primary.name: Holy Focus
primary.shortDesc: For all attacks and the Heal skill, Critical Rate: +40%, Magic Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Angel Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 14. Restores 10% of your Max HP for you and your party members.\nApplies a debuff to enemies hit by Angel Ray, which increases Final Damage of allies by 2% for 20 sec. The debuff can be stacked up to 5 times, and the Final Damage bonus is calculately cumulatively for each stack.
primary.desc: Fires a holy sword forward that damages a single enemy and applies a stacking debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage from you and your allies
  • Final Damage is calculated cumulatively
Heals party members that Angel Ray passes through including those affected by the 'Undead' debuff

primary.name: Genesis
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 324%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10, Crit Rate: +20%, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes rays of holy light that strike from above
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Big Bang
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 480%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nDamage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
primary.desc: Releases a burst of holy explosions damaging multiple enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Blessed Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Increases your Final Damage by 3% for each nearby party members under the effect of your buffs.
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack

primary.name: Holy Water
primary.shortDesc:
Passive Effect: Hitting enemies 7 times with Angel Ray generates 1 Holy Water. You can carry up to 5 Holy Water at one time.
Active Effect: MP Cost: 100. Requires at least 1 Holy Water. Consume all Holy Water in your possession to summon chalices of Holy Water nearby. If there is not enough space, only some of the chalices will be summoned. Chalice Duration: 5 sec, +5 sec per 2500 INT you possess. Party members recover 5% of HP upon using the Holy Water. Their HP Recovery is increased by 5% per 2500 INT you possess (this bonus is additive).
If the Holy Water disappears even though the duration remains, you get as much as 50% of Holy Water as the number of Holy Water that disappeared.
Cooldown 10 sec
details: [Passive]: Successfully landing 7 times will generate 1 Holy Water (up to 5)

[Active]: Consumes all Holy Water to summon chalices you and your party members can consume to heal
  • Press the Up Arrow Key while standing on top of a chalice to heal
  • The duration and amount healed per chalice is increased (additively) based on your INT stat, +5 sec & +5% recovery for every 2500 INT
  • If the active ends early, up to 50% of Holy Water is returned

primary.name: Blood of the Divine
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Damage Taken: +20% for 10 sec., HP Recovery: -99% (excludes healing items).
Increases Final Damage by 1% and an additional 1% per 5000 INT you possess (this bonus is additive), up to a maximum of 15%.
Cooldown: 264 sec
Cooldown reduced by 12 sec. per 5000 INT you possess, up to a maximum of 120 sec.
primary.desc: Increases %Final Damage however, increases %Damage Taken and reduces HP recovery (excluding healing items)
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key will cancel the buff
Increases amount of %Final Damage provided (additively) based on your INT stat, +1% for every 5000 INT (up to +15%)
Reduces the cooldown based on your INT stat, -12 sec for every 5000 INT (up to -120 sec)

primary.name: Resurrection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150. Revives all KO'd party members within range and makes them invincible for 8 sec.\nWhen revived by Resurrection on a map that has a death count, the party member who revived with Bishop will have 5% increased damage for 30 sec. The damage increase will grow by 1% greater for every 2500 points of INT, up to a maximum of 25%.\nCooldown: 300 sec.
primary.desc: Revives all party members within range
details:
Revived party members are briefly invincible and gain increased %Damage
  • Increases amount of %Damage provided based on your INT stat, +1% for every 2500 INT (up to +25%)
Consumes a Death Count for bosses but buffs are kept
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Duration: 40 sec. Periodically restores your base HP and MP by 10%.
Increases Final Damage by 70% during the buff. Periodically increases Final Damage by 3%, can increased up to 115%, Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Mana swirls around the character when 30% remains of the final buff duration (accounting for the duration-enhancing effects).
Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage (additively) and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
When the buff is close to expiring, a visual effect will appear around your character
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Bahamut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Bahamut Summon Duration: 260 sec\nDamage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 3\nEnemies attacked will be marked with Bahamut's insignia for 60 seconds. When you or a party member hit a marked enemy with a Holy attack, the Final Damage of the attack is increased by 25%, and the insignia is consumed.
primary.desc: Summons a dragon to attack nearby enemies while debuffing them
details: [Debuff]: Holy-attribute attacks deal increased %Final Damage and consume the debuff

Below is a list of skills that have a Holy-attribute:
  • Holy Arrow (2nd Job)
  • Heal (2nd Job) - Damages Undead-type enemies
  • Shining Ray (3rd Job)
  • Angel Ray (4th Job)
  • Big Bang (4th Job)
  • Bahamut (4th Job)
  • Angel of Balance (5th Job)
  • Peacemaker (5th Job)
  • Divine Punishment (5th Job)
  • Divine Charge (Paladin 3rd Job)
  • Heaven's Hammer (Paladin 4th Job)
  • Grand Guardian (Paladin 5th Job)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Blessing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 52, Attack Power: +30, Magic ATT: +30, DEF: +550, Max HP: +750, Max MP: +750, MP Consumption: -20%, Duration: 240 sec
details: Does not stack with

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increased Magic ATT: +30, Buff Duration: +50%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Successful attacks have a 100% chance to increase your damage by 8% for 5 sec (excludes minion damage).\nThis effect stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Successfully damaging an enemy grants a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

hyperPassive.name: Holy Magic Shell - Enhance
details: Includes %Max HP attacks

hyperPassive.name: Holy Symbol - Preparation
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance and Elemental Resistance: +10%\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%]

hyperActive.name: Righteously Indignant
hyperActive.shortDesc: Convert Heal, Dispel, Holy Fountain, and Holy Water to Angelic Wrath, Triumph Feather, Fountain of Vengeance, and Blood of the Divine.\nCooldown: 0.5 sec\n[Passive Effects] Magic ATT: +50, Final Damage: +30%, Ignore Defense: +20%, Enemy Elemental Resistance: -10%
hyperActive.desc: Switches between Benevolence skills and Vengeance skills
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage, %Ignore DEF, %Elemental Resistance, and grants Magic Attack

hyperActive.name: Heaven's Door
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 670%, Number of Attacks: 8, Protects party members from one KO.\nCooldown: 60 sec\nParty members that receive Heaven's Door cannot receive it again for 600 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Damages nearby enemies while granting a buff to nearby party members
details: [Buff]: Protects allies from one KO
After receiving a Heaven's Door's buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Benediction
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 42 sec, Final Damage (all party members in range): +5%
Party members other than yourself periodically recover 1% of max HP/MP, clear certain statuses, and have their Attack Speed increased.
Final Damage: +1% per 2500 INT (up to +40% max)
HP/MP Recovery: +1% per 2000 INT (up to +10% max)
Attack Speed: +1 per 10000 INT (up to +3 max)
Using the skill again within 5 sec after use reduces duration by 14 sec and cooldown by 60 sec.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an aura around your character where party members inside it gain a buff
details: [Buff]: Party members other than yourself gain increases %Final Damage and Attack Speed while periodically restoring %Max HP/MP and clearing certain Abnormal Statuses
While active, pressing the Skill Key again within 5 sec will reduce the duration and cooldown for a shorter version

Effects scale off of your INT stat:
  • [Final Damage]: +1% for every 2500 INT (up to +40%)
  • [HP/MP Recovery]: +1% for every 2000 INT (up to +10%)
  • [Attack Speed]: +1% for every 10000 INT (up to +3)

fifthMain.name: Angel of Balance
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 38 sec
Angel of Benevolence: Grants a buff that recovers 15% of party members' Max HP every 5 sec., and increases their damage by 5%, for 4 sec. and by 1% per 1250 INT. Damage can increase by up to 100%.
Avenging Angel: Attacks up to 12 enemies dealing 1000% damage 10 times. Attacked enemies are marked for 60 sec. Holy damage dealt to marked enemies by you and party members consumes the mark and grants the attack Final Damage: +10%.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons an angel based on whether Benevolence or Vengeance skills are active
details: Cannot be summoned while is active

[Vengeance]: Grants a buff to nearby party members that periodically restores %Max HP and increases their %Damage
  • Damage increase scales off of your INT stat, +1% for every 1250 INT (up to +100%)
[Benevolence]: Attacks nearby enemies and applies the debuff from however the %Final Damage bonus is decreased
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Peacemaker
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, deals 700% damage to up to 6 enemies 4 time(s) at every interval, or restores 40% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object.
Max Contact Count: 12. Both attacks and recovery consume the contact count.
Holy Light: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 12. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by 10% for 8 sec, while also increasing 1% for each remaining contact.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Sends an angel forward that damages enemies and heals party members it passes through
details:
At the end of its range, the angel lingers dealing damage and buffing party members
  • [Buff]: Increases %Damage
  • Pressing the Skill Key again will cause the angel to disappear
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Divine Punishment
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Attack: 40, Consumes 1 holy light per sec.
Attacks up to 6 enemies to the front, for 450% damage, 10 times.
1 holy light is prepared every 8.5 sec, and you can hold up to 8 at a time.
Cooldown: 1.5 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While held, rains down angelic arrows from above
details:
This skill has a special resource called Holy Light which are prepared every 8.5 seconds and you can hold up to 8 at a time
  • Costs 1 Holy Light per second to cast
Enemies will receive the %Final Damage debuff from when hit

meta: Bishop is an INT mage class part of the Explorers. Bishop utilize both Staves and Wands as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Bishop can equip Magic Books and Shields
